Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393997) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393997)
